title: A Brother for Susan
creator_credit: Southalls Ltd, Oswald Skilbeck and Winifred Holmes
brief_description: An account of the processes of human gestation from fertilization to the birth of a child. The film answers many question which arise in the mind of a fourteen-year-old child. Shows the visits of the mother to a baby clinic; explains how the human egg is fertilized; how menstruation ceases; the creation of the embryo, its growth to a nine-month baby, and its ultimate delivery.
